name: L.E.A.P! (JamFuser 2020 Submission)
description:
LET'S ENJOY A PARTY!

L.E.A.P is a cutesy game about rounding up all of your froggy friends for a party on Pluto! Explore the solar system and collect your pals to throw a surprise party for your friend Herbert! 


WASD - Movement
E (near an object) - Pick up
Click on frog - Interact
ESC - Pause

Ali Kennedy - Art //  Dribbble
Bradley Johnson - Programming // Twitter
Flynn Koller - Programming & Audio // Twitter
Joseph Whittle - Programming // Twitter

L.E.A.P was created in 72 hours for the Transfuser game jam - Jamfuser 2020. The given prompt was 'LEAP' - which inspired both the name of our game and the design/gameplay choices.
